comment: The main text block containing Chinese characters in vertical columns, including small seal script (篆书) and accompanying annotations. The text is arranged from right to left, typical of traditional Chinese books. It includes entries with definitions, phonetic notations (e.g., '切'), and etymological explanations. The heading '文十三 新附' indicates this is part of a section labeled 'Text 13, Newly Added'. The black border frames the entire text area.
